summary: A drama that charts ten years in a transgender woman's relationship with her lover.
cast: Melvil Poupaud|Suzanne Clément|Nathalie Baye|Monia Chokri|Susan Almgren|Yves Jacques|Sophie Faucher|Magalie Lépine Blondeau|Catherine Bégin|Emmanuel Schwartz|Jacques Lavallée|Perrette Souplex|Patricia Tulasne|David Savard|Monique Spaziani|Denise Filiatrault|Violette Chauveau|Mylène Jampanoï|Jacob Tierney|Gilles Renaud|Patrice Coquereau|Anne-Élisabeth Bossé|Anne Dorval|Pierre Chagnon|Éric Bruneau|Alexis Lefebvre|Denys Paris|Vincent Davy|Vincent Plouffe|Manuel Tadros|Alexandre Goyette|Antoine Olivier Pilon|Bronwen Mantel|Mario Geoffrey|Yvette Thuot|Jeanne Gionnet-Lavigne|Claude Gasse|Clément Deschênes|Mark Lambert|François Sasseville|Marie-Pierre de Brienne|Kevin Desmarescaux|Xavier Dolan|Emily Hampshire
title: Laurence Anyways
